thread.section_title: Point A Hotel, London Canary Wharf - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Nice location and good price
thread.title_full: Nice location and good price - Review of Point A Hotel, London Canary Wharf, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: christinev5
title: Nice location and good price
text:
I visited London last weekend with some friends. Point A hotel is a nice, no nonsens and efficient hotel at a good price. The rooms are very clean. The bed-and bathlinen is very good.
It is well situated in Canary Wharf and is a good starting point (underground, dlr, ...) for a trip to the various districts of London.
